mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (RNUM, MNUM, NNUM, CONTENT, SCORE,REVIEW_DATE) VALUES (seq_review.nextval,#{mnum},#{nnum},#{content},#{score},SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET CONTENT=#{content}, SCORE=#{score}, REVIEW_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE RNUM=#{rnum}
mapper.select: SELECT RNUM, MNUM, NNUM, CONTENT, SCORE,REVIEW_DATE FROM REVIEW WHERE MNUM=#{mnum} AND NNUM=#{nnum}
SELECT RNUM, m.MNUM,m.MEMBER_ID,NNUM, CONTENT, SCORE,REVIEW_DATE FROM REVIEW r INNER JOIN "MEMBER" m ON r.MNUM =m.MNUM WHERE r.NNUM=#{nnum}
select * from review r INNER JOIN novel n on r.nnum=n.nnum where r.MNUM=#{mnum}
select * from review r inner join member m on r.mnum=m.mnum inner join novel n on r.nnum=n.nnum
